text: Among the 118 patients with pneumonia , 16 ( 13 . 6 % ) were referred from another health center ; median length of hospital stay was 7 days ( IQR : 6 - 10 days ) for a total of 909 days of hospitalization ( Table 1 ) . The median time period between first symptoms and hospitalization was 6 days ( IQR : 4 - 7 days ) .
